name: Choose Your Research Adventure
description:
The purpose of this FigJam file to to begin ideation and help teams narrow down research through interactive games in FigJam!


Start off your next project with Choose Your Own Adventure! Comes with:

-Collaborative rules/parking lot

-Ice breakers

-Pick-and-choose Persona creator

-Problem statement generator

-Feature Prioritization

And more!


Start from the left and more right, or pick and choose what methods work best for your team.


Many of these games were derived from methods found at Gamestorming and altered to be FigJam compatible. For even more ideas, go to gamestorming.com
